title: Supreme Court Puts Trump’s Midterm Power Grab Back on Track
description: Thanks to a Supreme Court intervention that overturned a lower-court ruling, Texas is again poised to give Republicans five new House seats, and Trump’s drive to protect the GOP from the wrath of voters by rigging the map has new life.
content: For a while there, you could hear serious talk about Donald Trumps brazen midterm-rigging national gerrymandering initiative backfiring. Hes faced Republican resistance in Indiana, Kansas and Ohio an… [+3415 chars]
